descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sothebys International Realty is pleased to represent this ultra-modern 6 bedroom villa located in the prestigious area of Jumeirah 3. 
The unique 16,000 sq.ft. layout hides the villa with over 12 feet high walls protecting the full-length glass shell design that looks inward for the gorgeous views of a central courtyard with ample outdoor space next to beautiful water feature sculpture designed by owners themselves.
The dining area is one of the many gems of this house. The brass base for the dining table is fitted through the marble flooring with an ultra-thick glass top and designed intricately matching the pattern of the chandelier fixed on the ceiling. There is a Boffi show kitchen in the dining area where as the main dirty-kitchen is located in the basement next to the maid's rooms with an industrial cooking equipment. The entire home is fitted with top-notch Lutron automated smart lighting and motorized curtain system.
The bedrooms are all purposefully located on the first floor accessed through a light-well style staircase or an Otis Gen2 private elevator. The bedrooms are all interconnected through a wrap-around sky-lit corridor while they look inwards to the stunning masterpiece that is the central courtyard. The center courtyard also gives access to the open-air lounge area looking over the signature overflow pool with an underground balancing tank and a Jacuzzi, finished in the continuously matching Roman Travertine as the rest of the villa.
The basement floor's main feature is a spacious office with access from inside & outside the villa and featuring two safe rooms with Chubb Security doors and reinforced concrete walls. This floor includes a fully-featured Home theatre with 4K UHD projector and screen with Dolby surround-sound system and an air-conditioned spacious 5 car parking garage.
Contact us today to experience this extraordinary with a private viewing arranged for you."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionJumeriah Village Triangle is a vast community of most villas and townhomes sitting adjacent to the MBZ and Al Khail roads. Offering excellent and easy access to all other areas of the UAE. The community has also parks and the soon to be open Al Khail mall for residents.
This villa has been owner occupied from new and benefits from having an extra large plot of around 8,000 sq.ft. The owner has also built a superb insulated gazebo / outhouse in the garden. This could be used as bedroom, study or office. There is also a fenced off kennel area which easily houses up  to 3 dogs. The rest of the garden is mature and superbly landscaped with several sitting areas and plenty of space for outside entertaining. There are 2 covered car garage with direct access into the property.
Internally the ground floor has a spacious maid's quarters, guest bathroom and open plan fitted kitchen delivering superb views out the garden at the rear. Both 1st floor bedrooms offer ensuite bathrooms and plenty of cupboard space. There is also a small family room and substantial 300 sq.ft. front facing balcony. The property has been well maintained throughout and the seller has no mortgage and is motivated to sell.
FEATURES:
- 2,690 Sqft Built Up Area
- Huge Plot
- Insulated gazebo
- Fully Landscaped garden
- Large balcony
Viewing is highly recommended."]

Jumeirah Beach Residence.
Jumeirah Beach Residence (also known as JBR) is a 1.7 kilometres (1.1 mi) long, 2 square kilometres (0.77 sq mi) gross floor area waterfront community located against the Persian Gulf in Dubai Marina in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is a residential development and contains 40 towers (35 are residential and 5 are hotels). JBR can accommodate about 15,000 people, living in its apartments and hotel rooms. The Project has 6,917 apartments, from 900 sq ft (84 m2) studios to 5,500 sq ft (510 m2) penthouses. JBR has a total of six residential blocks, Shams, Amwaj, Rimal, Bahar, Sadaf and Murjan (in order from east to west). JBR is within walking distance to Dubai Marina and Dubai Metro.']

Sur La Mer is located adjacent to Port De La Mer, a ground-breaking master community located at the tip of the peninsula.
Residents have access to unparalleled shopping, dining and hospitality experiences, along with leisure, entertainment and convenience options.
Sur La Mer Townhouses by Meraas situated within the Port De La Mer in the heart of Jumeirah 1. First Freehold waterfront community in Jumeirah. The most accentuating feature of a good location is the connectivity it offers. Port De La Mer can be reached by both roadway and waterway. The property comprises living room, upgraded kitchen, dining area, maid’s room, study, downstairs WC and guest en-suite bedroom. Upstairs is the master en-suite bedroom with fitted wardrobes, a further two en-suite bedrooms and another two that share the family bathroom.
External benefits include garage parking, private rear garden and a full lake view from the rear.
